packages.name: lang.boolean
packages.summary: This module provides lang library operations on "boolean" values defined by the language specification 2020R1.

modules.summary: This module provides lang library operations on "boolean" values defined by the language specification 2020R1.
modules.description:
## Module Overview

This module provides lang library operations on `boolean` values defined by the language specification 2020R1.

returnParameters.description: boolean that `s` represents, or an error if there is no such boolean

functions.name: fromString
functions.description:
Converts a string to a boolean.
Returns the boolean of which `s` is a string representation.
The accepted representations are `true`, `false`
(in any combination of lower- and upper-case),
and also `1` for true and `0` for `false`.
This is the inverse of `value:toString` applied to a `boolean`.
